page.title: 06Houses in Bognor(specific)
page.content: There are 4 buildings in Hothampton Crescent.One of them is called the Dome.It is called that because there is a dome on top.All the buildings built by {Sir Richard {Hotham }are in the Georgian style.All the buildings in Hothampton Crescent are{Sir Richard Hotham's}master pieces,including Chapel House just across the road.There are lots of flats,cottages and bungalows along the sea front for the retired people.Many companies have built housing in the area,these include Wimpey Homes, Rookery farm houses and there is a council estate which allows people to pay rent or buy houses cheaply.Most buildings in Bognor are built of bricks and some of stone.Most of the houses are under 10 years of age,but some are hundreds of years old.
